image_1.description: Buckingham Palace is a significant location in London, known for the changing of the guard ceremony, which was curtailed due to the extreme heat.
A person dressed in a traditional red uniform with a black fur hat, holding a rifle, who is part of the changing of the guard ceremony at Buckingham Palace, which was affected by the heatwave.
A bald man wearing a white shirt and black vest, providing assistance to the guard, which might be related to the extreme heat measures taken at Buckingham Palace.

image_2.description: A large sculpture of a spoon with a cherry on top, also known as 'SPOON AND CHERRY SCULPTURE', created by the influential Pop artist Dalí, transforming an ordinary object into an imposing sculpture.
A large sculpture of a shuttlecock, also known as 'SHUTTLECOCK SCULPTURE', created by the influential Pop artist Dalí, transforming an ordinary object into an imposing sculpture.
A large sculpture of an arrow and bow, also known as 'CUPID'S SPAN SCULPTURE', created by the influential Pop artist Dalí, transforming an ordinary object into an imposing sculpture.

image_3.description: Covid-19 is an ongoing pandemic causing infections to rise in at least 40 states, particularly in the Great Plains, West, and South, and is characterized by new waves and variants affecting public health responses. The pandemic is also referenced in the context of public behavior, with many Americans shunning masks and joining crowds indoors, and state and local public health officials are responsible for factoring in the reality of the Covid wave in their response strategies.
source_text_entities: STATE AND LOCAL PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICIALS

image_3.description: The Chicago Health Department, led by Dr. Allison Arwady, is considering another citywide mask mandate based on hospital strain and is responsible for advising residents on how to handle the Covid warning level being raised to 'high'.
The BA.5 subvariant has driven a surge in Covid-19 cases since May, causing infections to rise in at least 40 states.

image_4.description: A large elephant with its trunk raised, showcasing its wrinkled skin and prominent ears, known for its ability to perform many feats of flexibility and force, which may be attributed to its nose.

image_5.description: A dense forest with tall trees and green foliage, serving as the setting where a woman with braided hair, wearing a turquoise top and an orange beaded necklace, is standing.
A woman with braided hair, wearing a turquoise top and an orange beaded necklace, standing in a dense forest with tall trees and green foliage.
